detail.description: Siyaram Silk Mills Ltd is a Textile manufacturing company. It is engaged in manufacturing fabrics and readymade garments, especially in the men’s wear section. [1][2] The Company exports to countries like UAE, Australia, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Cambodia, Canada, etc. [3]
